desc: Ley Mettz is a mindful brand originating in one of the world’s oldest civilisations and embodies principles of universal mysticism. Our stylish, holistic and androgynous jewels have been handcrafted with love. Like an individual, no two pieces are alike, making each one special.

layout.text: Fine jewellery inspired by ancient symbology, combined with diamonds and natural, semi-precious stones that heal, strengthen and uplift.
